channel.title: Heber Junior on Portfolio Project
channel.description: Recent content in Heber Junior on Portfolio Project

item.title: First Personal Project, Heber Junior
item.description: In my second year of the computer science course, my colleagues and I received an assignment for an indiplinary project that insisted on creating and versioning a portfolio site - which, oddly enough, is the one I’m posting this message hehe -, until this At the time of the championship I had never even thought about what steps were taken to create a website. therefore, my colleagues and I went out to research and follow the tips that our advisors gave us, where to look and how a website works.
